name: Maze Game for Mac
description:
Welcome to the Maze Game!

This is a first person adventure that takes place in a maze. There is a princess trapped in the far end of the maze.

You are playing the role of a prince on the mission to rescue the princess.
When the game starts, you will find yourself in some random location inside the maze. You need to complete certain tasks.

To do so, you have to wander in the maze and in doing so, you need collect as many coins and stones as you can. These items will empower you to complete the various tasks which you will come across on your way. If you have found a stone or a coin, run to it and collect it. Otherwise, it will disappear soon.

If you still feel confused about this game, you can click on the guide button on the left hand side. If you want to have an adventure, you can turn it off and play by yourself.

Good luck and enjoy the game!

Controls:

WASD - Movements

Shift - Run

C - Show the cursor

Right Click - Back to the MouseLook mode

You can also play this game in the browser by this link:

https://xinyumiao412.itch.io/mazegame-web
